page.title: 10ST. ANDREW'S CHURCH HOLT.
page.content: THE CHURCH IS BUILT OF FLINT AND STONE. IT HAS BEEN STANDING THERE FOR {770 YEARS}BUT A GREAT DEAL OF IT NOW IS{VICTORIAN RESTORATION.}THE CHURCH IS 25 M. HIGH (INCLUDING THE TOWER). THE CHURCH WAS BADLY{BURNT IN {1708.}THERE HAVE BEEN ABOUT{14 ALTARS SINCE IT WAS BUILT AND IN THE CHURCH THEY HAVE TO KEEP PRECIOUS THINGS LOCKED UP IN ROOMS OR CUPBOARDS. THERE ARE 9 SERVICES EACH WEEK AND 160 PEOPLE COME TO CHURCH ON A SUNDAY. THERE IS A CLOCK ON THE OUTSIDE IT WAS PUT THERE IN{1734.}THERE IS A CANDLE WHICH NEVER GOES OUT, IT'S NAME IS THE LIGHT OF THE BLESSED SACRAMENT. IN THE TOWER THERE ARE{6 BELLS,}THERE ARE 4 STATUES(OF HOLY PEOPLE). THE CHURCH DOES NOT HAVE A VICAR BUT A RECTOR. THERE HAVE BEEN ABOUT 15 TO 20. THE VERY PRECIOUS SILVER IS KEPT AT THE BANK.
